detail.quote: In any moment of decision, the best thing you can do is the right thing, the next best thing is the wrong thing, and the worst thing you can do is nothing.
The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
The best way to predict the future is to create it.
To be nobody but yourself in a world which is doing its best, night and day, to make you everybody else - means to fight the hardest battle which any human being can fight; and never stop fighting.

I’m selfish, impatient, and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I’m out of control, and at times hard to handle. But if you can’t handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don’t deserve me at my best.
Living well is the best revenge.
To give anything less than your best, is to sacrifice the gift.
I do the very best I know how - the very best I can; and I mean to keep on doing so until the end.
Knowing your own darkness is the best method for dealing with the darknesses of other people.
At his best, man is the noblest of all animals; separated from law and justice he is the worst.
The best revenge is to be unlike him who performed the injury.
The best revenge is massive success.
I am as bad as the worst, but, thank God, I am as good as the best.
I did my best, and God did the rest.
Expect the best. Prepare for the worst. Capitalize on what comes.
A problem is a chance for you to do your best.
I have the simplest tastes. I am always satisfied with the best.
Grow old with me! The best is yet to be.

Do what you love to do and give it your very best. Whether it’s business or baseball, or the theater, or any field. If you don’t love what you’re doing and you can’t give it your best, get out of it. Life is too short. You’ll be an old man before you know it.
Nobody who ever gave his best regretted it.
The best way to keep one’s word is not to give it.
There are some things you learn best in calm, and some in storm.
You have to accept whatever comes and the only important thing is that you meet it with courage and with the best that you have to give.
Learn to say ’no’ to the good so you can say ’yes’ to the best.
To love and win is the best thing. To love and lose, the next best.
The best vision is insight.
I believe that a simple and unassuming manner of life is best for everyone, best both for the body and the mind.
The worst thing that happens to you may be the best thing for you if you don’t let it get the best of you.
Whether it’s the best of times or the worst of times, it’s the only time we’ve got.
The best revenge is to live on and prove yourself.
The best ideas come as jokes. Make your thinking as funny as possible.
I always prefer to believe the best of everybody, it saves so much trouble.
The most basic question is not what is best, but who shall decide what is best.
At its best, life is completely unpredictable.
The best way to find out if you can trust somebody is to trust them.
But I always think that the best way to know God is to love many things.
It is best for the wise man not to seem wise.
The best work is not what is most difficult for you; it is what you do best.
If a man does his best, what else is there?
That’s your best friend and your worst enemy - your own brain.
It’s a funny thing about life; if you refuse to accept anything but the best, you very often get it.
I have made the choices that work best for me. I know I cannot please everyone, and that’s fine.
The best way of removing negativity is to laugh and be joyous.
Old friends are best.
This is the precept by which I have lived: Prepare for the worst; expect the best; and take what comes.
The best preparation for tomorrow is to do today’s work superbly well.
The best thing about the future is that it comes only one day at a time.
One of the best things to do sometimes is simply to be.
The best doctors in the world are Doctor Diet, Doctor Quiet, and Doctor Merryman.
It was the best of times, it was the worst of times.
The best road to progress is freedom’s road.
When things are bad, it’s the best time to reinvent yourself.
Look your best - who said love is blind?
The best luck of all is the luck you make for yourself.
You get the best out of others when you get the best out of yourself.
The best things in life are silly.
I will do my best. That is all I can do. I ask for your help - and God’s.
Find out what you like doing best and get someone to pay you for it.
I have found the best way to give advice to your children is to find out what they want and then advise them to do it.
Just do what you do best.
In any moment of decision, the best thing you can do is the right thing, the next best thing is the wrong thing, and the worst thing you can do is nothing.
The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
The best way to predict the future is to create it.
